EmailTemplate.name: RV GSAP Contract Failure Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Deal {!SAP_Staging__c.SfItemShtNo__c} - failed to create a contract in GSAP
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi, Contract Creation of Deal {!SAP_Staging__c.SfItemShtNo__c} is failed in GSAP. with below error. Please take appropriate action to add the contract in GSAP manually and update the Contract Number back into Salesforce. Record: {!SAP_Staging__c.Link} Error from GSAP: {!SAP_Staging__c.Error_Processing_to_GSAP__c} Possible Actions: The deal did not get created in GSAP, you might consider to create the deal manually in GSAP and add the GSAP Contract Number in the comment field in Salesforce. This is an auto generated email, Please do not reply. Thanks, Revolution Team
